website_summaries.verdict: Traditional jewelry chest with extensive storage options to hold a modest jewelry collection.
pros: Three mirrors located at flip-up top and on the sides
Equipped with four drawers, 8 necklace hooks, and a ring roll that holds 10 rings
Rich mahogany finish and etched-glass doors
cons: Expensive option, and it may not be ideal if you have bulky or oddly-shaped pieces

customer_reviews.title: Its just perfect 💕
customer_reviews.text: I really like it 😍 Its really beautiful,well made and big.I can put my jewlery and makeup inside.Really recommed buying it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful craftsmanship, arrived undamaged
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful jewelry box/micro cabinet that is just as sharp in person as it is in the manufacturer's pictures. I ordered it on a Sunday and it was delivered on Wednesday. The item arrived very well packaged and cushioned. There was padding on both sides of the glass panels to keep them intact. I fully inspected the unit for any defects or scratches and could not find anything that was damaged. The hinges and drawers all work as designed. The frosted glass etchings are a wonderful accent. I am very satisfied with this item
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER KARLEN

customer_reviews.title: Wife Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this jewelry box! It is sturdy and well made. Has lots of storage and can hold full length necklaces in the side compartment. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bakersworld

customer_reviews.title: no crap covered with wood like paper and a wooden lid
customer_reviews.text: Should have come with earplugs because our niece screamed when she saw it. Solid box, packing materials, and everything was safety wrapped. The entire thing is wood, no crap covered with wood like paper and a wooden lid.
customer_reviews.author: Sugarplum

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Item was purchased as a birthday present. When box was opened, the top compartment had some damage to the finish. Did not want the hassle of repackaging, and sending item back. The gift was accepted as is. Will not purchase from Hives & Honey.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Zarzano

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this Jewelry Box

customer_reviews.text: Product came to me broken, the glass on one side . The shipping box it came in was perfectly fine so I'm not sure what happens but was very disappointing when I opened it up yesterday to find that the glass was broken.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.title: One of these things is not like the others.......
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, packaging very well and arrived Undamaged. One flaw.... handle installed upside down on one drawer. I unfortunately do not have time to ship it back as it is a gift for my wife who has been waiting over 2 years to arrive in USA. Guess I have a unique one of a kind jewelry box now. 😁 positive thoughts, positive life! UPDATE- I contacted the manufacturer through facebook messenger and they responded immediately and are sending a replacement drawer. Great service!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: My second one. My first - idiot installed the light fixtures poorly and one fell off the wall and broke the glass and dinged the wood, so the need to buy a new one. It's been 16 years so it was a miracle that they are still making them. I have always LOVED this. It's appearance is gorgeous and the quality is excellent. When something needs to be done right, you do it yourself - I bought new - better hardware and installed the light fixtures myself (renovation). My jewelry chest sits on the en-suite counter between the light fixtures (above) and it looks as fabulous as ever.

product_meta.title: Hives and Honey Patricia Etched Glass Mahogany Jewelry Chest Jewelry Box
product_meta.description: Well, hello there, little beauty. You ll say that every time you walk up to the patricia jewelry chest (and when you look in the mirror, just inside the top lid). and what a little beauty It is with the rich antiqued Mahogany finish, antiqued brass drawer pulls, rounded design, and etched floral flourishes. A top hinged lid opens to reveal 10 ring rolls and 4 divided compartments. Two etched glass doors hold necklace hooks and more storage. The six spacious drawers provide the perfect spot for bracelets, watches, necklaces, or other jewelry.
feature_bullets: Rich Antiqued Mahogany Finish, Antiqued Brass Drawer Pulls, And A Rounded Design With Etched Floral Flourishes
Top Hinged Lid Opens To Reveal 10 Ring Rolls And 4 Divided Compartments
Two Etched Glass Doors Hold Necklace Hooks And More Storage
Six Spacious Drawers Provide The Perfect Spot For Additional Storage
Fully Lined With Anti-Tarnish Felt And Fully Assembled

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars170 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
